HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Thank you for using Elite Bionics Framework, a framework to enable hediffs to modify body part max HP.|- Added "linear adjustment" parameter for EBF Hediffs; refer to documentation on how they work, and how body part max HP are calculated
- Added "scaling adjustment" parameter for EBF Hediffs; refer to documentation on how they work, and how body part max HP are calculated
Beta 1.| - Framework addition: now possible to adjust melee attack damage for Hediffs and Hediff_Implants; refer to GitHub documentation for more info.
Beta 2.| - Fixed unexpected, critical "failed to apply Harmony patches" bug due to RimWorld update v1.1.2598
Beta 3.| - Fixed a NullReferenceException related to social fights.
Beta 4.| - Technical update: Max-HP-related transpilers now at priority = Priority.First .
Updated to RimWorld v1.2.| - Notice to C# modders: a new C# class EBFEndpoints is available to read the max HP of body parts under the effects of EBF; more details at the GitHub repo
Standardize entire mod to use namespace "EBF" to reduce confusion.

- Fixed potential tool-related null-reference error with Save Our Ships 2 - Improved tool comparison logic to reduce occurence of null-reference errors with various other bionic mods (please see if those errors are fixed!)
- Attack Power Adjustors now skips some problematic hediffs when checking applicability; should result in even less NullReferenceException
- Recalibrated this mod to be compatible with RW v1.3 - Pre-RW v1.3 compatibility is not affected; this is making use of the multi-version feature of RW
- Fixed Harmony patching conflicts with Pawnmorpher (not backported)

Traded some features: - [+] This mod no longer gives exception when used with Humanoid Alien Races; but - [-] EBF hediffs that increases pawn core part HP now does NOT reduce % chance of pawn getting stunned after taking blunt damage +-------------

Improved the previous trade: - [+] This mod no longer gives exception when used with Humanoid Alien Races; and - [+] EBF hediffs that increases pawn core part HP now CAN reduce % chance of pawn getting stunned after taking blunt damage (cancels the negative effects of v4.0.5) - [*] Now must be loaded before Humanoid Alien Races; PLEASE USE THE AUTO-SORT TO REAPPLY LOAD ORDER! +-------------|Special thanks to GitHub user RocketDelivery for this fix!
